S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.1_1: niścetano 'py ucitacetanatām ivaiti yaḥ pūjyapūjanavidhau kusumādivargaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.3_1: bhagavan prauḍhim āyātā kanyā mama sumāgadhā //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.5_0: kanyāṃ dadāmi tāṃ tasmai bhagavan yadi manyase /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.6_1: ko doṣas tanayā tasmai dīyatām ity abhāṣata //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.7_0: śāstuḥ śāsanam ādāya sādaraṃ pranipatya tam /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.9_0: dattā dūrataraṃ deśam atha yāntī sumāgadhā /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.12_1: gṛhān naḥ prātar āgantā jagatpūjyaguṇo jinaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.14_0: ity uktā sā tayā tatra babhūvārambhatatparā /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.18_1: digambarāṇām apy agre yad ihāste vadhūjanaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.20_0: asthāne bhavatāṃ bhaktiḥ ko 'yam ucchṛṅkhalaḥ kramaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.20_1: na tyaktam aśanaṃ yena sa kathaṃ vastram ujjhati //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.20_4: dambhārambhabhayaṃkare ca vadane krodhaḥ svayaṃ lakṣyate
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.20_5: nagnānām aśanaiṣiṇāṃ niyaminām eṣāṃ paśūnām iva //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.22_0: yatraite paśavaḥ pūjyās tatrotsāryā bhavanti ke /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.23_0: iti bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ śvaśrūr viṣaṇṇā pratyabhāṣata /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.23_1: pitus te bhavane bhadre pūjyate vada kīdṛśaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.24_0: sāvadan matpitur gehe pūjyate bhagavān jinaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.24_5: kāntyaivāsau kim api viduṣāṃ śāntim antas tanoti //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.27_1: niḥśeṣitasmṛtibhuvaḥ pramadāśrayasya rāgojjhitasya sutarām adharaḥ sarāgaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.27_3: kṣāntis tanmayakāriṇī hṛdi dayā gāḍhaṃ samāśleṣiṇī /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.29_0: pūjyaḥ sa bhavane 'smākaṃ yasya pravrajyayā satām /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.31_0: iti tasyā vacaḥ śvaśrūḥ śrutvā śrotrarasāyanam /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.38_0: tvatpādapadmayugalaṃ śaraṇam prapannāṃ dūrasthitām api dṛśā spṛśa māṃ dayālo /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.38_1: vātsalyapeśaladhiyāṃ mahatāṃ pravāsadurīkṛteṣu karuṇā na tanutvam eti //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.39_1: prātar āgamanenaiva mānaṃ vitara me vibho //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.41_0: sā śvetaraktaharitāsitapuṣpapālī khe dhūpadhūmaśabalā śanakaiḥ prayāntī /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.43_0: bhagavān api sarvajñaḥ sarvaṃ jñātvā samīhitam /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.45_1: ekenāhnā ca gantavyaṃ na vilambo 'tra yujyate //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.46_0: vyomnā maharddhyā śaknoti gantuṃ yo yaḥ prabhāvavān /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.49_1: pāṇau prāha tam ānandaḥ kiṃcit smitasitānanaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.52_1: hantuṃ sapatnaiḥ śakyante prāptum ṛddhipadaṃ kiyat //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.58_1: ūcuḥ sumāgadhāṃ prītyā kim eṣa bhagavān iti //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.60_1: kim ayaṃ kim ayaṃ bhadre bhagavān iti tāṃ jaguḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.62_1: āścaryakṛn mūrta iva prabhāvaḥ śrīmān mahākāśyapa eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.63_1: vyomnā samabhyeti gunaiḥ pragītaḥ sa eṣa bhikṣur bhuvi śāriputraḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.64_0: āruhya kailāsam ivātiśubhraṃ dvipam caturdantam anantakāntiḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.64_1: āyāti yaḥ puṇyavatāṃ jagatsu maudgalyanāmā ca sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.65_1: upaiti yaḥ saurabhapūritāśaḥ sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ prathito 'niruddhaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.66_1: vigāhate sphitavanena bhikṣur maitrāyaṇīsūnur ayaṃ sa pūrṇaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.67_0: anantam āsthāya nitāntaśāntam īrṣyāpathaṃ sattvamahodadhir yaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.67_1: prabhāmṛtaiḥ sarpati tarpitāśaḥ prabhāvavān eṣyajid eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.68_1: yaḥ puṇyapūrṇadyutir abhyupaiti sa eṣa bhikṣur matimān upālī //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.69_1: limpann ivāgacchati yaḥ prabhābhiḥ kātyāyano nāma sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.70_0: śarīriṇaṃ dharmam ivādhiruhya vigāhate khaṃ vṛṣavāhano yaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.70_1: pṛṣṭhaḥ pratiṣṭhāpariniṣṭhitānāṃ gariṣṭhadhīḥ kauṣṭhila eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.7l_1: kurvan samabhyeti taponidhir yaḥ pilindavatsāhvaya eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.72_1: sa śroṇakoṭiḥ śruta eṣa bhikṣur akṣuṇṇalakṣmīr gṛhanirvyapekṣaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.73_0: yaś cakravartī divi bhāti so 'yaṃ śāstuḥ suto rāhulakābhidhānaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.74_0: ete giribhyo 'tha digantarebhyaḥ kṣmāmaṇḍalād vyomataṭāntarāc ca /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.75_0: tayā krameṇeti nivedyamānaṃ te bhikṣusaṃghaṃ vimukhaṃ vilokya /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.78_0: aṣṭādaśadvārapathā puraṃ tat sa tulyam aṣṭādaśamūrtir eva /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.79_0: abhyarcitas tatra bahuprakāraiḥ pūrṇopacāraiḥ praṇipatya sarvaiḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.79_1: apūjayat paurajanaḥ samantād bahiś ca bhittipratibimbitaṃ tam //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.80_0: sumāgadhāyā dayayā dayāluḥ pūjāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavān sasaṃghaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.81_0: sumāgadhā saśvaśurādivargā sahāparaiḥ paurajanaiś ca sarvāḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.81_1: śāstus tayā deśanayā babhūvuḥ śuddhāśayās tatkṣaṇadṛṣṭasatyāḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.82_0: sumāgadhāyāḥ kuśalānubandhaṃ puṇyaṃ prabhāvaṃ vipulaṃ vilokya /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.82_1: te bhikṣavas tatra kutūhalena papracchū ramyaṃ jinam ādivṛttam //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.83_0: pṛṣṭaḥ sa taiḥ saṃsadi sarvadarśī sumāgadhāyāḥ kuśalasya hetum /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.83_1: dantaprabhābhiḥ kakubhāṃ mukheṣu diśan prakāśam bhagavān babhāṣe //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.84_0: vārāṇasyām abhūt pūrvaṃ kṛkeḥ kantasya bhūpateḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.85_1: paricaryāṃ vyadhāt sārdhaṃ sakhīnāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.88_0: iti teṣām anādṛtya vacaḥ krūrataraṃ nṛpaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.88_1: bhagavantaṃ yayau draṣṭuṃ kāśyapaṃ duhitur girā //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.89_0: sa tam etyāvadat svapnaḥ savikāraḥ paraṃ mayā /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.89_1: dṛṣṭo 'dya sarvaṃ sarvajña tatphalaṃ vaktum arhasi //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.90_1: tṛṣitasya tathā paścāt kupo dhāvan vilokitaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.96_0: śatāyuṣi jane śāstā śāntaḥ śākyamunir jinaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.96_1: bhaviṣyaty amṛtāmbhodhiḥ sa drṣṭaḥ kuñjaras tvayā //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.98_1: svayaṃ sevāṃ samālambya kariṣyanty eva deśanām //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.99_1: tṛṣitasya vrajan paścāt kūpas tasmād vilokitaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.106_1: iti śāstur vacaḥ śrutvā vismito 'bhūn mahīpatiḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.ll0_1: rucā saṃpūrayann āśāṃ yayau jetavanaṃ jinaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.ll0_3: sūnuś ced aguṇas tad eva viphalaṃ tat kiṃ na sarvaṃ kulam /
S01kbavk93u:kavk_93.ll0_4: sā kanyā kila jāyate guṇavatī puṇyaprabhāvād yayā
S01kbavk93u:0_0: iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ sumāgadhāvadānaṃ trinavatitamaḥ pallavah.
